mapper.select: select employee_id as id, employee_name as name, employee_password as password, employee_email as email, employee_tel as tel, employee_photo as photo, employee_zipcode as zipcode, employee_basic_address as basicAddress, employee_detail_address as detailAddress, employee_employment_status as status, employee_created_date as createdDate, employee_updated_date as updatedDate, fitness_no as fitnessNo from employees where employee_id = #{value}
